handbookSubtitle: A structured guide to starting and running a business in Kazakhstan.
decideLegal: Before registering, decide between Individual Entrepreneur (IE/IP) and Limited Liability Partnership (LLP/TOO).
egovNotice: You can register online via eGov.kz or banking apps (Kaspi, Halyk).
registeredPhone: Registered phone number in Mobile Citizens Database
prepareDocs: Depending on business type, prepare specific documents.
proofAddressDesc: Address certificate (can be pulled from eGov)
founderDecisionDesc: Written decision to start the company
folderTip: Tip: keep scans in one folder
taxRegimeText: Choosing the right regime saves money. Many small businesses start with Simplified Declaration.
simplifiedDesc: Most popular: pay 3% of turnover semi-annually. Has limits by turnover and employees.
retailTaxDesc: For certain sectors (often restaurants): different rates for sales to individuals vs companies.
generalRegimeDesc: Paid on net profit (Revenue − Expenses). Useful if you have high confirmed expenses.
mistake1A: Even with no income, you must submit reports with zeros, otherwise accounts can be blocked.
mistake2A: Especially for LLPs. Treat business money as separate from your personal wallet.
mistake3A: You must pay pension/social insurance for yourself and employees monthly (depending on your status).
nextHandbook: Next: keep going chapter by chapter and ask questions in Community.
letYouKnow: We'll let you know when something happens!
